welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Parsons, a charming city known for its scenic views and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
